text: Jasale (svargaduta) allahako asana ucaleka chan ra usako variparika pharistaharu aphno palanakartako gunagan gardachan ra usamathi imana rakhdachan ra imanavala manisaharuko nimti ksamako prarthana gardachan, bhandachan, kih ‘‘he hamro palanakarta! Timile aphno dayaluta ra aphno jnanale pratyeka kurama vyapka chau. Atah juna manisaharule prayascita gare ra timro margako anusarana gare, uniharula'i ksama garide'u ra prajvalita narkako agoko yatanabata uniharula'i baca'ihala
